title: Replace MediClear app logo with uploaded image

requirements.text: Replace the current app logo image with the newly uploaded logo (download.webp) in both AppHeader.tsx and SplashScreen.tsx. Save the new logo as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/app-logo.png and update all references to use this file.
acceptanceCriteria: The new logo (dark background with stylized 'ab' letterform in dark red/charcoal) is visible in the AppHeader on all screens
The new logo is visible on the SplashScreen during app load animation
No references to the old logo remain in the codebase
The logo renders without distortion and at an appropriate size in both locations

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
nonGoals: Changing app color scheme or theme
Updating any text branding or copy

edits: Convert and save the uploaded logo as a clean PNG with transparent background, preserving the stylized dark charcoal and deep red 'ab' letterform with layered diamond accent below (download.webp > app-logo.dim_256x256.png)
